instName: ﻿Academy of the Immaculate Conception of Our Lady of Mercy
instNote: ﻿Attached to this convent is a house of mercy, where young girls of good character, out of situations, recieve instruction, and are provided with suitable situations. The sisters visit the sick and dying in their homes and in the hospital, also the prison and the poor-house, where they instruct and console the inmates.
